mapper.select: Select rownum rn, a.* From ( Select w.*, m.member_name as reguser_name, m.member_name as updateuser_name From wh w, member m Where w.reg_user = m.member_uid And w.update_user = m.member_uid And w.use_yn != 'X' ) a
mapper.update: Update wh Set wh_name = #{whName}, use_yn = #{useYn}, update_date = sysdate, update_user = #{updateUser}, memo = #{memo} Where wh_code = #{whCode}
